alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 12:26AM CST until February 16 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR NORTHERN PUSHMATAHA...SOUTHEASTERN LATIMER AND LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 1226 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Panama to 7 miles northeast of Talimena State Park to 4 miles north of Snow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Clayton... Heavener... Panama... Talihina... Wister... Howe... Fanshawe... Cameron... Albion... Talimena State Park... Snow... Tuskahoma... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Clayton Lake State Park... Bengal... Lake Wister State Park... Nashoba... Muse... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
